ref.div: Aapala K, Haapalehto T, Lindholm T, Sallantaus T, Similä M, et al.. (2008) Framework for peatland restoration in conservation areas. In: Farrel C, Feehan J, editors. After Wise Use - The Future of Peatlands, Proceedings of the 13th International Peat Congress. Tullamore, Ireland: International Peat Society. 1–4.
